sentences.en: A chart showing the main organizational structure of a company.
sentences.cn: 标明公司主要组织结构的图表.

sentences.en: ADB's organizational structure there are the Council and the Board of Directors.
sentences.cn: 亚行的组织机构主要有理事会和董事会.

sentences.en: All these preliminary organizational tasks were normal to such enterprises.
sentences.cn: 对如此伟业,所有的初步组织工作,均属正规.

sentences.en: Applying the Three Lenses in an Organizational Setting , pp . 94 - 96 .
sentences.cn: 运用三种观点来观察并了解整个组织体系, 第94-96 页.

sentences.en: Emphasis on teamwork, good communication and coordination ability and organizational capacity.
sentences.cn: 注重团队精神, 有良好的沟通协调能力与组织能力.

sentences.en: Evelyn's excellent organizational skills were soon spotted by her employers.
sentences.cn: 伊夫琳出色的组织才干很快就被她的雇主发现了。

sentences.en: He behaves in ways which tend to defeat organizational objectives.
sentences.cn: 他就会用一种有损于组织目标的方式来行事.

sentences.en: Methods: The organizational and management experience atand abroad were compared.
sentences.cn: 方法通过对比,借鉴国内外企业组织管理方面的经验.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the relationship between personnel satisfaction and organizational citizenship behavior.
sentences.cn: 目的研究员工满意度等因素与组织公民行为之间的关系.

sentences.en: Organization theories ( OTs ) are loosely connected around organizational phenomena.
sentences.cn: 摘要组织理论是有关组织现象的松散理论集群.

sentences.en: Organizational Improvement: The CMM is a model for organizational improvement.
sentences.cn: 组织改进: CMM是组织改进的模型.

sentences.en: Other Requirements: An entrepreneurial attitude approach with strong communication and organizational skills.
sentences.cn: 其它要求: 具有较强的事业心,沟通和组织能力强.

sentences.en: Our discussion identifies some of the vagueness in organizational life.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论弄清了组织生活中的一些不明确现象.

sentences.en: Solution Folders can be nested to create greater organizational structure.
sentences.cn: 可以嵌套解决方案文件夹,从而创建更大的组织结构.

sentences.en: This problem needs to be dealt with at an organizational level.
sentences.cn: 这个问题需要在机构层面上解决。

sentences.en: Through a variety of such devices , Carlson succeeded in flattening UAL's organizational pyramid.
sentences.cn: 通过各种各样的这类措施, 卡尔森成功地展平了联合航空公司金字塔形的组织结构.

有机地；有组织地；器官上地
组织者；承办单位；[生物] 组织导体

组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等

trans.tran_en: Organizational abilities and methods relate to the way that work, activities, or events are planned and arranged
